mapper.select:
SELECT cs.counselNo, cs.counselTitle, cs.counselContent, DATE_FORMAT(cs.counselDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS counselDate, mem.memNick FROM counsel cs JOIN memberinfo mem ON cs.memNo = mem.memNo WHERE 1=1
AND cs.memNo = #{memNo}
AND cs.counselTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(cs.counselContent, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (cs.counselTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR REGEXP_REPLACE(cs.counselContent, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY cs.counselNo DESC

SELECT cs.counselNo, cs.counselTitle, cs.counselContent, DATE_FORMAT(cs.counselDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS counselDate, mem.memNick, c.answerId, c.answerContent, DATE_FORMAT(c.answerDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS commentDate, c.memNo AS commentWriter FROM counsel cs LEFT JOIN memberinfo mem ON cs.memNo = mem.memNo LEFT JOIN counselanswer c ON cs.counselNo = c.counselNo WHERE cs.counselNo = #{counselNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counsel (counselTitle, counselContent, counselDate, memNo) VALUES (#{counselTitle}, #{counselContent}, NOW(), #{memNo})
mapper.select: SELECT memNo FROM counselanswer WHERE answerId = #{answerId}

SELECT c.answerId, c.answerContent, DATE_FORMAT(c.answerDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS commentDate, c.memNo, m.memNick FROM counselanswer c JOIN memberinfo m ON c.memNo = m.memNo WHERE c.counselNo = #{counselNo} ORDER BY c.answerDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counselanswer (counselNo, answerContent, answerDate, memNo) VALUES (#{counselNo}, #{answerContent}, NOW(), #{memNo})
